Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.tree

This package defines all basic classes to provide various tree-related navigation, rendering, and drag-and-drop support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MappableNode An interface to indicate whether the subject has participated in mapping or not.
 

Class Summary
AutoscrollableTree This class defines the default implementation of JTree with Autoscroll knowledge.
DefaultMappableTreeNode This class is to provide the basic implementation of MappableNode on a Tree Node, overriding equals() and hashCode() methods, and other functions to facilitate usage of various occassions.
DefaultSourceTreeNode This class extends the default mutable tree node as the tree node used to construct Source Tree for left-pane MetaData in mapping panel or other occurrences related to CSV or other type of metadata loaders in the whole UI arena.
DefaultTargetTreeNode This class extends the default mutable tree node as the tree node used to construct Target Tree for right-pane MetaData.
TreeDefaultDragTransferHandler Implement full drag and drop handling.
TreeDefaultDropTransferHandler This class provides the default implementation of drop handling on tree.
 

Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.tree Description

This package defines all basic classes to provide various tree-related navigation, rendering, and drag-and-drop support.
